text: Eric Gordon Cunningham (April 14, 1949 - January 1, 2015) was a Canadian politician. He was a Liberal Ontario MPP for the Legislative Assembly of Ontario from 1975 until 1984. Cunningham was born in Hamilton, Ontario. Aside from politics, he was an advertising executive. Cunningham died in his sleep on January 1, 2015 in Huntsville, Ontario, aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Eric Cunningham at the Legislative Assembly of Ontario Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:People from Hamilton, Ontario Category:Politicians from Ontario
title: Eric Cunningham
